00038 #include <stdlib.h>
00039 #include <string.h>
00040 #include <stdio.h> 
00041 #include "AVI_avi.h"
00042 #include "endian.h"
00043 #include "avi_intern.h"
00044 
00045 #ifdef __BIG_ENDIAN__
00046 #include "MEM_guardedalloc.h"
00047 #endif
00048 
00049 #ifdef __BIG_ENDIAN__
00050 static void invert (int *num)
00051 {
00052     int new=0,i,j;
00053 
00054     for (j=0; j < 4; j++) {
00055         for (i=0; i<8; i++) {
00056             new |= ((*num>>(j*8+i))&1)<<((3-j)*8+i);
00057         }
00058     }
00059     
00060     *num = new;
00061 }
00062 
00063 static void sinvert (short int *num)
00064 {
00065     short int new=0;
00066     int i,j;
00067 
00068     for (j=0; j < 2; j++) {
00069         for (i=0; i<8; i++) {
00070             new |= ((*num>>(j*8+i))&1)<<((1-j)*8+i);
00071         }
00072     }
00073 
00074     *num = new;
00075 }
00076 
00077 static void Ichunk (AviChunk *chunk)
00078 {
00079     invert (&chunk->fcc);
00080     invert (&chunk->size);
00081 }
00082 #endif
00083 
00084 #ifdef __BIG_ENDIAN__
00085 static void Ilist (AviList *list)
00086 {
00087     invert (&list->fcc);
00088     invert (&list->size);
00089     invert (&list->ids);
00090 }
00091 
00092 static void Imainh (AviMainHeader *mainh)
00093 {
00094     invert (&mainh->fcc);
00095     invert (&mainh->size);
00096     invert (&mainh->MicroSecPerFrame);
00097     invert (&mainh->MaxBytesPerSec);
00098     invert (&mainh->PaddingGranularity);
00099     invert (&mainh->Flags);
00100     invert (&mainh->TotalFrames);
00101     invert (&mainh->InitialFrames);
00102     invert (&mainh->Streams);
00103     invert (&mainh->SuggestedBufferSize);
00104     invert (&mainh->Width);
00105     invert (&mainh->Height);
00106     invert (&mainh->Reserved[0]);
00107     invert (&mainh->Reserved[1]);
00108     invert (&mainh->Reserved[2]);
00109     invert (&mainh->Reserved[3]);
00110 }
00111 
00112 static void Istreamh (AviStreamHeader *streamh)
00113 {
00114     invert (&streamh->fcc);
00115     invert (&streamh->size);
00116     invert (&streamh->Type);
00117     invert (&streamh->Handler);
00118     invert (&streamh->Flags);
00119     sinvert (&streamh->Priority);
00120     sinvert (&streamh->Language);
00121     invert (&streamh->InitialFrames);
00122     invert (&streamh->Scale);
00123     invert (&streamh->Rate);
00124     invert (&streamh->Start);
00125     invert (&streamh->Length);
00126     invert (&streamh->SuggestedBufferSize);
00127     invert (&streamh->Quality);
00128     invert (&streamh->SampleSize);
00129     sinvert (&streamh->left);
00130     sinvert (&streamh->right);
00131     sinvert (&streamh->top);
00132     sinvert (&streamh->bottom);
00133 }
00134 
00135 static void Ibitmaph (AviBitmapInfoHeader *bitmaph)
00136 {
00137     invert (&bitmaph->fcc);
00138     invert (&bitmaph->size);
00139     invert (&bitmaph->Size);
00140     invert (&bitmaph->Width);
00141     invert (&bitmaph->Height);
00142     sinvert (&bitmaph->Planes);
00143     sinvert (&bitmaph->BitCount);
00144     invert (&bitmaph->Compression);
00145     invert (&bitmaph->SizeImage);
00146     invert (&bitmaph->XPelsPerMeter);
00147     invert (&bitmaph->YPelsPerMeter);
00148     invert (&bitmaph->ClrUsed);
00149     invert (&bitmaph->ClrImportant);
00150 }

00152 static void Imjpegu (AviMJPEGUnknown *mjpgu)
00153 {
00154     invert (&mjpgu->a);
00155     invert (&mjpgu->b);
00156     invert (&mjpgu->c);
00157     invert (&mjpgu->d);
00158     invert (&mjpgu->e);
00159     invert (&mjpgu->f);
00160     invert (&mjpgu->g);
00161 }
00162 
00163 static void Iindexe (AviIndexEntry *indexe)
00164 {
00165     invert (&indexe->ChunkId);
00166     invert (&indexe->Flags);
00167     invert (&indexe->Offset);
00168     invert (&indexe->Size);
00169 }
00170 #endif /* __BIG_ENDIAN__ */

00172 void awrite (AviMovie *movie, void *datain, int block, int size, FILE *fp, int type)
00173 {
00174 #ifdef __BIG_ENDIAN__
00175     void *data;
00176 
00177     data = MEM_mallocN (size, "avi endian");
00178 
00179     memcpy (data, datain, size);
00180 
00181     switch (type) {
00182     case AVI_RAW:
00183         fwrite (data, block, size, fp);
00184         break;
00185     case AVI_CHUNK:
00186         Ichunk ((AviChunk *) data);
00187         fwrite (data, block, size, fp);
00188         break;
00189     case AVI_LIST:
00190         Ilist ((AviList *) data);
00191         fwrite (data, block, size, fp);
00192         break;
00193     case AVI_MAINH:
00194         Imainh ((AviMainHeader *) data);
00195         fwrite (data, block, size, fp);
00196         break;
00197     case AVI_STREAMH:
00198         Istreamh ((AviStreamHeader *) data);
00199         fwrite (data, block, size, fp);
00200         break;
00201     case AVI_BITMAPH:
00202         Ibitmaph ((AviBitmapInfoHeader *) data);
00203         if (size==sizeof(AviBitmapInfoHeader) + sizeof(AviMJPEGUnknown)) {
00204             Imjpegu((AviMJPEGUnknown*)((char*)data+sizeof(AviBitmapInfoHeader)));
00205         }
00206         fwrite (data, block, size, fp);
00207         break;
00208     case AVI_MJPEGU:
00209         Imjpegu ((AviMJPEGUnknown *) data);
00210         fwrite (data, block, size, fp);
00211         break;
00212     case AVI_INDEXE:
00213         Iindexe ((AviIndexEntry *) data);
00214         fwrite (data, block, size, fp);
00215         break;
00216     default:
00217         break;
00218     }
00219 
00220     MEM_freeN (data);
00221 #else /* __BIG_ENDIAN__ */
00222     (void)movie; /* unused */
00223     (void)type; /* unused */
00224     fwrite (datain, block, size, fp);
00225 #endif /* __BIG_ENDIAN__ */
00226 }
